card_text: Place 1 Resonance Counter on 1 card in your Pendulum Zone that you can place a Resonance Counter on, then apply 1 of these effects.$N●Gain 500 LP, then you can add 1 of your banished "Vaalmonica" cards to your hand, except "Vaalmonica Disarmonia".$N●Take 500 damage, then you can add 1 "Vaalmonica" card from your GY to your hand, except "Vaalmonica Disarmonia".$NYou can only activate 1 "Vaalmonica Disarmonia" per turn.
